supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 14 x 42, (A) 3 lines, right margin (?), (B) blank, (2) 50 x 42, (A) 6 lines, top right margins, (B) 3 lines, top margin, (3) 55 x 31, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) 5 lines, bottom margin, (4) 58 x 41, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (5) 48 x 66, (A) 5 lines, left bottom margin, (B) 7 lines, left bottom margins, (6) 46 x 22, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (7) 26 x 22, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 35 x 14, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 30 x 34, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, left margin, (10) 26 x 23, (A) 6 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (11) 19 x 23, (A) 2 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (12) 20 x 21, left margin, (B) blank, (13) 75 x 39, (A) 9 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (14) 70 x 43, (A) 6 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (15) 69 x 47, (A) 2 lines, bottom margin, (B) 9 lines, left top (?) bottom (?) margins, (16) 57 x 47, (A) 7 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (17) 82 x 42, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank
